description: With a pom-pom hat perched on the playful marmot at the front chest, this Men's Pom Pom Short-Sleeve Graphic T-shirt is a nod to your offbeat approach to off-road adventures. Soft and quick-drying, this shirt will keep you comfortable whatever the day brings. Part of our earth-conscious T-shirt collaboration with Thread International, this tee from the Marmot x Thread collection is helping to reduce environmental impact and create positive change in Haiti through cool, eco-friendly designs. Post-consumer plastic bottles are recycled into Marmot UpCycle® quick-drying polyester fabric and then blended with cotton.
name: Marmot Pom Pom Tee SS - Mens

specs.value: 52% Organic Cotton 48% Recycled Polyester Jersey Knit 4.4 oz
